lead_paragraph: The three-time champion Marat Safin of Russia rallied to beat Robin Soderling of Sweden, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the third round of the Paris Masters.
snippet: The three-time champion Marat Safin of Russia rallied to beat Robin Soderling of Sweden, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the third round of the Paris Masters.
